S.FORM: Kana ita mnswayi, prajing ta da.
Hiyug kana! Thmuku!
Embiyax su hug? Emptgsa
Tluung.
Kana laqi,. jiyax sayang ptgsa ku munan shuya rmngaw kari Seejiq ka uuqun.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的賽德克語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Sederik.

S.FORM: Klaun namu qmbahang kari emptgsa hug?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: Emptgsa, ini mu klai qmbahang. Tduwa su emkingal rmngaw duri hug?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我聽不懂。您可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: Ini mu qbhangi, kparu hari ka hnang su hug?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，您講大聲一點好嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: Qita hini! Purug knan txal duri.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: Kiya! Malu balay ka snpug su.
S.TRANSL: Yes! You read that very well.

S.FORM: Spug txal duri Kparu hari ka hnang.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: Iya squwaq!
Ngali ka patas.
Iq wa! Emptgsa.
Ngali ka ppatas.
Emptgsa, wada ku smhungi madas ppatas da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Ngali ka ssrus.
Emptgsa, wada ku smhungi madas ssrus da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: Kbarux ssrus siyaw thiyan su smluhay.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: Kbrxi ku ssrus hug?
Malax nami muyas patas da.
Dhuq hini ka slhayan ta han, strung ta babaw duri.
S.TRANSL: 我們就先學習到這邊，我們下次再見。
Class dismissed, see you next time.

S.FORM: Ima su ka isu hug?
Pisaw ku ka yaku.
Ima su ka isu?
Laqi ku Basaw ka yaku. Pisaw ka hangan mu.
S.TRANSL: I am the son of Basaw, and my name is Pisaw.

S.FORM: Ima su ka isu hug?
Emptgsa mu ka Basaw Pisaw ka hangan mu.
S.TRANSL: I am a student in Basaw, my name is Pisaw.

S.FORM: Ima ka hangan su hug?
Hangan mu o Pisaw.
Manu ka hangan tama su hug?
Basaw ka hangan tama mu.
Ima ka hiya?
Kuras ka hiya.
Qbsuran mu snaw ka hiya. Kuras ka hangan na.
S.TRANSL: He's my brother, his name is Kuras.

S.FORM: Manu ka hangan niya?
Kuras ka hangan na.
Teymu ka hangan niya hug?
Iq! Teymu ka hangan niya.
Teymu ka hangan niya hug?
Uxay! Kuras ka hangan niya.
Ima ka seejiq gaga hug?
Ipay ka hiya. Swayi bubu mu qrijil ka hiya. Nirih mu bubu ka hiya.
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Dangi mu ka hiya. Lubi ka hangan niya.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Lubi。
She's a friend of mine and her name is Lubi.

S.FORM: Piya ka hngkwasan su?
Maxal ka hngkwasan mu.
Piya ka hngkwasan niya?
Maxal dha ka hngkwasan na.
Piya hngkwasan niya ka tama su hug?
Mrimal ka hngkwasan tama mu.
Niqan su piya mnswayi hug?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: Niqan dha ka qbsuran mu, kingal ka swayi mu.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: Niqan qbsuran su snaw hug?
Ungac ka qbsuran mu snaw.
Niqan piya hiyi ka tnsapah namu hug?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: Niqan spac hiyi ka tnsapah nami.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: Gaga su meuyas patas inu hug?
Gaga ku meuyas patas Taycung.
Ya embiyax ka tama su ni bubu su hug?
Msblaiq ni embiyax bi ka tama ni bubu, mhuway su!
S.TRANSL: 爸爸媽媽都很平安健康，謝謝您！
Mom and Dad are safe and healthy, thank you!

S.FORM: Ima ka hiya hug?
Swayi tama mu ka hiya.
Gaga qmpah manu ka mnswayi snaw bubu su hug?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: Keysacu ka hiya.
Ima ka seejiq gaga hug?
Qbsuran mu qrijil ka hiya.
Niqan qpahun na ka qbsuran su qrijil hug?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: Gaga qmpah sapah spuhan ka hiya hug?
Mnswayi ka dhiya hug?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: Uxay, msdangi ka dhiya.
Tnpusu su seejiq ka isu hug?
Iq! Seejiq ku balay ka yaku.
Tnpusu seejiq ka dungus su hug?
Iq! Ida Thau ka hiya.
Bowqax ka tama su hug?
Iq! Bowqax kana ka tnsapah mu.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: Wada meuyas sapah pyasan ka swayi su qrijil dhug?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: Iq! Wada meuyas sapah pyasan ka hiya.
Mkla rmngaw kari Seejiq ka swayi su hug?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: Iq! Mkla rmngaw kari Seejiq ka dhiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: Niqan su piya mnswayi hug?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: Niqan ku tru mnswayi.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: Tuhuy su mniq tama ni bubu hug?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: Iq! Tuhuy ku mniq tama ni bubu mu.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: Tuhuy su mniq tama rudan ni bubu rudan hug?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: Ini! Ini ku tuhuy mniq dhiya.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn't live with them.

S.FORM: Tuhuy su mniq ima?
Tuhuy ku mniq tama, bubu ni qbsuran mu snaw.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: Pnaah su inu hug?
Pnaah ku Kawsyung.
Gaga inu ka sapah namu hug?
Gaga Kawsyung ka sapah nami.
Gaga inu ka alang su hug?
Gaga Kawsyung ka alang mu.
Gaga inu ka alang namu hug?
Gaga Kawsyung ka alang nami.
Musa su alang knuwan hug?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Sngayan rbagan ga ida ku musa alang.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: Yaku o laqi ku Seejiq.
Hmuya ka karac jiyax sayang?
Smriyu ka hidaw do mtalux ka karac da.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: Mskuy ka nganguc kug?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: Mskuy bi, lkusi egu hari lukus.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Mtalu ka nganguc hug?
Ini! Sbgihur da, mltu ka karac.
Hmuya ka karac jiyax sayang.
Ini ka kskuy ni ini ka kcilux uri, qrasun bi.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac keeman sayang?
Ungac rulung ka karac, nii smriyu ka ppngrah da.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac nganguc hug?
Msuwal sayang bi, smbu ka hidaw do smriyu ka hakaw utux da.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac namu hiya hug?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: Sbgihur paru ka yami hini.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: Isu hiya o ya malu ka karac jiyax sayang hug?
Malu! Smbu hidaw da.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: Musa ku meuyas sapah pyasan da.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: Mskuy bi ka karac, lkusi egu hari lukus.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Musa ku nganguc da.
Pquyux paru kiya da, iya shungi madas bubung.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Pquyux hug?
Bruwa da, pquyux bi kiya da.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: Qmuyux da?
Qmnuyux ka suni, msuwal ka sayang da.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: Qmuyux da?
Mhuriq ka elug, saw bi qmnuyux da.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: Qmuyux hug? Ma mhuriq kana ka lukus su?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: Gaga qmuyux ka nganguc, ini ku adas bubung.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Ya su malu hug?
Sbgihur paru, maku mnarux ka tunux mu.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: Ya su malu hug?
Smbu paru hidaw maku tkuni ka tunux mu.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: Smhungi ku madas ppatas da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Kbrxun misu.
Nii kbrxi han!
S.TRANSL: You can borrow this one first!

S.FORM: Smhungi ku madas daquc da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: Ini ku adas ka yaku uri, emta marig hug?
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: Emta marig ppatas hug?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: Iq! Pbarig ku ssrus na.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: Emta marig uqun mgrbu hug?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: Uxay ku! Mnkan ku sapah da.
S.TRANSL: I don't want it, I ate it at home.

S.FORM: Smhungi ku ktalux hndayu da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Sai pktalux nhari.
Smhungi ku hndayu da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Supu ta mkan hndayu mu ha!
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: Mkan su manu ska hidaw hug?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Peekan ku hnapuy sapah pyasan ska hidaw.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: Mkan su manu ska hidaw hug?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Hndayu ku ka jiyax sayang, supu ta mkan hndayu mu ha!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: Emta hrapas rancyow hug?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: Malu wah! Emta.
Emta hrapas pangcyo hug?
Uxay ku! Peuyas ku patas.
S.TRANSL: I don't want it, I want to study.

S.FORM: Jyagi ku mangal sksik hug?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the broom?

S.FORM: Iq! Nii ka sksik.
Jyagi ku mangal galiq ssrus hug?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: Gaga ku smsik dxgal, lawa Siray dmayaw sunan hug?
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor, you ask Siray to help you.

S.FORM: Mnhdu su smsik dhug?
Mnhdu ku smsik da.
Ma su ini sksik hug?
Mnhdu ku smsik da.
Mruciq bi ka babaw uqan, sai smrus han.
S.TRANSL: The table is dirty, go wipe it.

S.FORM: Iq! Musa ku mangal galiq.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: Mruciq bi ka bling gagi gaga, sai smrus han.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: Iya han, ini mu qhdui smsik ka hini na.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: Phuya su kiya hari da?
Musa ku miying emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: Phuya su malax meuyas patas kiya da?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: Tuhuy ku dangi musa meuyas uyas.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: Phuya malax meuyas patas kiya ka hiya da?
S.TRANSL: What does he do after school?

S.FORM: Mowsa ku tmapaq qsiya msa.
S.TRANSL: He said he was going swimming.

S.FORM: Gaga sapah ka Lituk hug?
Gaga sapah ka hiya, aguh mtmay sapah.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: Gaga sapah ka Lituk hug?
Ungac hini ka hiya, phuya su hug?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She's not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: Ima hug?
Tama rudan, Bakan ku rwahi ka rhngun!
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, this is Bakan, please open the door.

S.FORM: Ima isu?
Kumu, Away ku, miyah ku tuhuy sunan.
S.TRANSL: Kumu, I'm Away, I've come to play with you.

S.FORM: Sndamac namu balay.
S.TRANSL: (I've been with everyone) Long time no see.

S.FORM: Iq! Lnglungun balay. Aguh tuhuy ha!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let's chat!

S.FORM: Tluung! Mahi ocya han.
S.TRANSL: 請坐，請先喝茶。(用語調表示誠意)
(Please) sit down, (Please) have tea first (intonation indicates sincerity).

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay!
Aguh mimah ocya.
S.TRANSL: Come on! Please have tea (come and have tea)

S.FORM: Tagay knmalu mahun ka ocya namu.
Uqi ta hiyi qhuni han!
Wah! Tagay knmalu qtaan ka hiyi qhuni nii.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: Malu uqun ka hiyi qhuni hug?
Iq! Malu bi uqun.
Mnhdu mhapuy damac keeman ka bubu da, aguh mkan nhari.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: Iq wa! Musa ku trima baga han.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: Kbiyax mkan, ita nanaq hmi!
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，我們是自己人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, we are family.

S.FORM: Egu bi ka wada mu uqun mtngi ku bi da.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I'm full.

S.FORM: Ktngi mkan, iya qsiqa.
Ena! Malu bi uqun.
Musa ku da, strung ta babaw duri.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I'm leaving, I'll see you next time.

S.FORM: Iq! Swayay ta han.
Keeman da, musa ku sapah da.
Aguh tuhuy babaw duri ha!
Thuway musa.
Ena! Niqan jiyax su o aguh tuhuy sapah.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: Kana lqlaqi, musa ta qmita rudan alang ka jiyax sayang.
S.TRANSL: 各位小朋友，今天我們要去部落探訪耆老喔!
Kids, today we’re going to visit the elders in the tribe!

S.FORM: Wa, malu wah! Asi ta ka skari kari Seejiq wah!
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老說賽德克語。
Yes! We’re going to talk to the seniors in Sederic.

S.FORM: Uxay ta biyaw dhuq dhug?
Pdhuq ta da.
Akay balay! Ma namu mkla rmngaw kari Seejiq! Malu balay wah!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說賽德克語啊!真是太棒了!

S.FORM: Kana lqlaqi, musa ta qmpah knpahan masu ka jiyax sayang.
S.TRANSL: 各位小朋友，今天我們要去小米田工作。
Kids, today we’re going to work in Little Rice Fields.

S.FORM: Kiya wah, emptgsa.
Aguh hini kana, adas qyqaya namu ni kngkingal miyah.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來，帶著你們的工具一個接著一個的來。
Come, everyone, bring your tools one by one.

S.FORM: Iq wah! Emptgsa, mnhdu nami mangal qyqaya da.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.

S.FORM: Dhuq ta dhug?
Ini na, ida dhiyaq na.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it’s still far away.

S.FORM: Usa smuyuq qsiya ka isu?
Iq! Yaku ka smuyuq qsiya.
Usa mangal taktak sqliwaq qduda.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: Iq! Yaku ka lmiwaq qduda.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: Kana lqlaqi, musa ta qlangang ssamac ka jiyax sayang.
S.TRANSL: 各位小朋友，我們今天要去動物園。
Kids, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: Wa, malu wah! Pshuya ta musa hug?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: Peapa ta basu musa.
Kngkingal mhiyug psramal ta marig cepyaw.
S.TRANSL: 一個一個站好，我們準備買票。
Stand one by one, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: Iq wa!
Brah o qqduda, bukuy o qquyu, usa nanaq qmita.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: Emptgsa, miisug ku quyu.
Iya kiisug! saw kiya do usa qmita qduda ka isu.
S.TRANSL: It doesn’t matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: Bukuy na kingal patas hidaw do pssli ta hini duri.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後再回來這裡集合。
We’ll be back here in an hour.

S.FORM: Iq! Emptgsa mhuway su balay.
Manu ka qntaan su jiyax sayang.
Egu bi ka qntaan mu quyu, egu bi ka qntaan mu qduda uri.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: Nhari hari, musa ta da.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: Tgai ku han, mnarux bi ka qaqay mu.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: Tuhuy ta musa tmapaq qsiya hug?
Wada sayang bi.
Hbaraw bi seejiq ka gaga tmapaq qsiya hini.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: Mrbuq bi ka qsiya hiya, asi ta ttapaq qsiya hini
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: Pneapa su manu miyah?
Mnksa ku.
Pneapa su rulu manu miyah?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: Pneapa ku basu.
Pshuya su musa prhulan?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to church?

S.FORM: Pgriq rulu ka tama ni supu nami musa.
Shuya musa sapah pyasan kjiyax ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: Peapa ceyyun musa sapah pyasan.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: Shuya musa marig damac ka bubu su rudan?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: Peapa utubay musa marig damac.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: Pshuya su musa Ranyutaw hug?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Lantau Island?

S.FORM: Peapa ku asu musa Ranyu.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: Pshuya musa Ranyutaw ka hiya hug?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: Peapa sapah skaya musa Ranyu ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: Peapa rulu manu musa Kawsyung ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: Peapa Kawtey musa Kawsyung ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: Peapa rulu qrngul musa Taytung ka hiya hug?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: Iq! Peapa rulu qrngul musa Taytung ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: Peapa rulu qrngul musa Taytung ka hiya hug?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: Uxay wah! Peapa sapah skaya musa Taytung ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: Niqan saan tmaga basu ka kiyig hini hug?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: Niqan wah! Klelug brah mksa do qtaun su ka saan tmaga basu da.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: Inu ka sdalih bi ceyyuncan hug?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: Ungac ceyyuncan ka hini, wana haya ka tduwa ppanun.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: Musa piya patas hidaw ka ppanan basu, kika pdhuq sapah pyasan?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: 15 spngan do pdhuq sapah pyasan da.
Kndadax Taypey dhuq Taycung o musa piya patas hidaw hug?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵自臺北到臺中要多少時間？
How long does it take to take the THSR from Taipei to Taichung?

S.FORM: Kingal patas hidaw do pdhuq Taycung da.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: Kndadax Cirung dhuq Uray o musa piya patas hidaw hug?
S.TRANSL: 從基隆開車去烏來要很久嗎?
Is it a long drive from Keelung to Ulai?

S.FORM: Nasi tluus ka kleelug o yabi musa hari kingal patas hidaw do pdhuq da.
S.TRANSL: 如果路況順利的話，大約要一個小時可以抵達。
If the road condition is good, it will take about an hour to get there.

S.FORM: Peapa su ceyyun miyah sapah mu o bsiyaq hug?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?

S.FORM: Asi ka 20 spngan.
Mkla su peapa ddeynsya hug?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: Mkla ku peapa ddeynsya.
Niqan su utubay hug?
Niqan ku kingal utubay.
Niqan su utubay hug?
Ungac ku utubay.
Tduwa ku smiling sunan hug?
Iq! Smruwa ku.
Tduwa ku smiling sunan hug?
Iya, ini keegu ka klaan mu.
S.TRANSL: Don't, I don't know much about it.

S.FORM: Niqan jiyax su babaw nkan ska hidaw hug? Kmusa ku qmita sunan.
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: Iq! Tgaun misu sapah.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Niqan jiyax su kusun hug? Kmusa ku smiling sunan quri kari snruan.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你阿美族傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I would like to ask you about the story. *[Amis] Please change to your respective tribe.

S.FORM: Musa ku dgiyaq daya ka kusun, ini ku eniq sapah wah!
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

S.FORM: Qnbahang mu o klaun su bi ka endaan rudan Seejiq sbiyaw, mkmsilng ku sunan.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對賽克德族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I've heard that you're very knowledgeable about the traditional customs of the Secedes and would like to ask you a few questions.

S.FORM: Uxay egu ka klaan mu, ida mu rngagun kana ka klaan.
S.TRANSL: 我了解的不多，我會把知道的說出來回答。
I don't know much, I'll answer with what I know.

S.FORM: Tduwa ku Ruing hug? Psklxan mu matas hici.
S.TRANSL: (請問)我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: Iq! Ini huya!
Piya ka hngkwasan su dhug?
Mngari kmxalan mspac ka hngkwasan mu da.
Mbiyax su bi qtaan.
Mbiyax inu da, rudan ku da.
Pnaah su inu?
Pnaah ku alang Pulan.
S.TRANSL: I come from the Buran tribe.

S.FORM: Seejiq balay uri ka qrijil su hug?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是賽德克族人嗎?
Is your wife also a Sedek?

S.FORM: Uxay! Bunun ka hiya.
Mkla su rmngaw kari dha hug?
Mkla ku rmngaw kari Truku ni bunun.
S.TRANSL: 我會說太魯閣語和布農語。

S.FORM: Qrasun balay ka miyah smiling sunan, rngagi cikuh ka quri Gaya ssaan tmsamac hug?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: Iq! Mbiyax ku siida o musa ku bi lmiqu.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay, egu balay ka tnegsa su knan jiyax sayang.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天真的指導我很多。
Thank you, you really guided me a lot today.

S.FORM: Ida balay bi hnici kari rdrudan sbiyaw ka snruan mu nii.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: Dhuq hini ka ssiling mu sunan. Mhuway su bi balay.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: Ini huya! Tduwa ta pprngaw na.
S.TRANSL: 沒有關係, 我們還可以聊。
It's okay, we can still talk.

S.FORM: Musa ku han, babaw do mkmqbahang ku egu snru kari na.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I'm going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: Han! Kmhuway musa ha.
Malu su! Marig su manu hug?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Marig ku kingal suqi.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: Malu su! Marig su manu hug?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Marig ku kingal bunuh.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: Marig ku suqi, niqan hug?
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup, do you have one?

S.FORM: Niqan, piya ka brigun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Niqan namu pinrang sbarig hug?
Ungac, ini nami barig pingrang.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: Marig ku buwax.
Marig su piya hug?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Bqani ku tru lubuy.
Marig ku bunga.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Wada qduan marig da.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: Marig ku dha tasaw abura.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: Sngari Kingal bi tasaw da.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: Jiyagi ku musa marig balung.
Marig su piya tnhjilan?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Marig su piya tnhjilan balun g?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Marig ku 2 tnhjilan.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: Marig ku dha bnkiyan neygi.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: Sngari 3 bnkiyan da hini, bqanun misu kana da.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: Piya pila ka kingal lubuy buwax nii?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: 2 kbkuy ka kingal lubuy.
Kana do empusal kingal pila, ana nanaq empusal da.
Mhuway su balay.
Nii mngari kmxalan rima pila.
Marig ku cikuh duri, pklui 1 kbkuy.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: Kana o rima kbkuy maxal pila.
Ana nanaq 5 kbkuy pila hug?
Suqi mkray brigan da, khnuk hari hug?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: Uxay kida! Ida wada mhnuk brigan da.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: Marig ku lnbuan pingkan nii.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: Mrimal ka emu nii, marig su mmanu na hug?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: Kbrxi ku pila su hug?
S.TRANSL: Can you lend me the money?

S.FORM: Iq! Piya kbrxun su?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: Wada ku smhungi madas pila da, tduwa ku kmbarux pila su hug?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Ini ku adas pila uri.
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: Wada ku smhungi madas pila da, tduwa ku kmbarux pila su hug?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Uxay, ini su bqani knan ka knbrxan su na.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: Tduwa ku kmbarux lukus su hug?
Iq! Ngali nanaq.
Tduwa ku kmbarux patas su hug?
Wada mu kbrxun Ciwas da.
Kbrxi knan ka ddeynsya su hug?
Iq! Asi su ka yahun mhaduc kusun.
S.TRANSL: 好，你明天一定要送還喔!
Okay, you have to return it tomorrow!

S.FORM: Qmuyux da, ini ku adas bubung, kbrxi ku bubung hug?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

S.FORM: Kingal balay ka bubung mu, supu ta mubung hug?
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: Knbrxan su knan snduray ka patas nii, bqanun misu da.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: Mqmita su meenu patas o rngagi ku.
S.TRANSL: Tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: Bqanun misu knuwan ka pila?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: Ini huya! Mduuy su do bqani ku da.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It doesn't matter, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: Bqanun su knan knuwan ka knbrxan su pila da?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: Bqanu misu kusun da.
S.TRANSL: 我明天還你。/我明天送來。
I'll return it to you tomorrow. /I'll send it tomorrow.

S.FORM: Bqanun su knan knuwan ka knbrxan su patas da?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: Wada su bqanan shiga dhmi?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?/我昨天已經還你了啊?
I paid you back yesterday, didn't I? /I gave it back to you yesterday, didn't I?

S.FORM: Kuras ka knbarux sunan ppatas nii hug?
S.TRANSL: Did Kuras lend you this pen?

S.FORM: Iq! Knbrxan mu hiya jiyax sayang.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: Knbrxan su Kuras ka ppatas nii hug?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Kuras?

S.FORM: Uxay! Bnarig bubu ka nii.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: Ungac da cimu, usa kmbarux cikuh cimu Pitay.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Pitay.

S.FORM: Ena, musa ku kmbarux.
Sai rmngaw ka Pitay, haduc ka pila knbrxan su ksa.
S.TRANSL: Go and ask Pitay to pay me back.

S.FORM: Piya ka knbrxan na pila.
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: Musa su inu?
Musa ku hmuma sama qnalang ssama.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: Gaga su hmuya?
Gisu ku mabal spriq, syuqun mu qsiya kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: 我在拔草，等一下要澆水。
I'm pulling weeds and will be watering them later.

S.FORM: Adas hini ka soki ni parih hug?
S.TRANSL: 把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來這兒，好嗎?
Bring your scythes and hoes here, will you?

S.FORM: Gaga su bsaan inu?
Bsai siyaw bkaruh.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: Tnbunan su da dxgal hug?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: Tnbunan mu sayang balay ka dxgal, saun mu smupu kiya da!
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: Tduwa ngalan ka hnuma su sama dhug?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: Tduwa smqic ka tmana hini da, ini na ka sama watan gaga.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: Wah! Tagay bi da knarig su banga nii.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
(sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: Jiyagi ku pusa rpun hug?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: Gaga namu hmuya?
Gaga nami pusa kaji qsurux.
S.TRANSL: We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: Egu ka qsurux hini hug?
Egu bi ka qsurux gaga ruwan rawa.
S.TRANSL: We caught a lot of fish in the fish basket.

S.FORM: Shuya su qmraq ka qsurux hug?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: Mduuy ku sahu gamil qmraq qsurux.
S.TRANSL: I use poison ivy to catch fish.

S.FORM: Mduuy su buji tmsamac hug?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: Powsa ku gasil seangal mu ssamac, mnsuwil ku madas puniq phuling uri.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱取得獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually use traps to get my prey, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: Elug bowyak ka nii.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: Ma su klaun?
Dapil bowyak ka nii, kiya ni elug bowyak ka hini.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: Sai nhari qmita ka gasil ta, saw bi wada tjiyal samac da.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: Ma su mkla.
Saw bi wada smknux ka huling da, saay ta nhari smnegul.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: Gaga su smalu manu?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: Dangar ka nii, sqraq qowlic.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: Manu ka gaga su psaan hiya?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: Gasil ka gaga, sqraq nami pada.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: Malu balay utux nami, egu bi ka nangal nami jiyax sayang.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: Kiya hmi! Dsun nami alang ni seasug mkan knealang.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: Jiyax sayang emptgsa ga ptgsa munan shuya rmngaw kari seejiq ka ssamac.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的賽德克語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in 3S3T language today.

S.FORM: Jiyax sayang emptgsa ga ptgsa munan shuya rmngaw kari Seejiq ka c-wu.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的賽德克語怎麼說。

S.FORM: Jiyax sayang emptgsa ga ptgsa munan shuya rmngaw kari seejiq ka hiyi qhuni.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的賽德克語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in 3S3T language today.

S.FORM: Iya taqi.
Iya squwaq.
Iya ekan uqun.
Angal ka patas su.
Angal ka lubuy patas su.
Angal ka ppatas su.
Angal ka bnatas su patas.
Skui ka patas.
Skui ka ppatas.
Skui ka uuqun.
Skui ka qyqaya hrpasan.
Neima ka ppatas nii?
Iq! Naku.
Neima ka patas nii?
Iq! NKuras.
Neima ka ssrus nii?
Ini ku kla.
NWalis ka lukus gaga?
Uxay, nLituk ka lukus gaga.
Emptgsa, ini ku adas patas.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: Seupu qmita yamu siyaw gxal.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: Stuq da ppatas mu.
Duuy ppatas matas.
Ungac qtaan da ssrus mu.
Kbarux misu ssrus mu.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: Malax nami meuyas patas da, qlahang balay mksa elug.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: Iq wa! Mhuway su balay emptgsa.
Malax nami meuyas patas da, swayay ta han.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: Swayay ta han emptgsa.
Embiyax namu kana hug? Hangan mu o Lituk.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Lituk.

S.FORM: Embiyax su hug? Lituk.
Embiyax namu kana hug? Hangan mu o Lubi.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Lubi.

S.FORM: Embiyax su hug? Lubi.
Embiyax su hug? Yaku o Bakan.
Embiyax su hug? Bakan. Yaku o Pawan.
Embiyax su hug? Yaku o Apay.
Embiyax su hug? Apay. Yaku o Walis.
Ima su ka isu?
Bubu ku Ukan, Yaku o Ubing.
Ima su ka isu?
Swayi ku qrijil Basaw ka yaku, hangan mu o Aking.
S.TRANSL: 我是Basaw的妹妹，我的名字是Aking。
I am Basaw’s sister. My name is Aking.

S.FORM: Ima ka hiya?
Emptgsa mu ka hiya, hangan na o Kuras.
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Qbsuran mu snaw ka hiya, Pering ka hangan niya.
Awi ka hiya hug?
Iq! Awi ka hiya.
Away su ka isu hug?
Uxay! Tapas ku ka yaku.
Ima ka Habaw hug?
Yaku ka Habaw.
Ima ka Teymu hug?
Dangi mu ka Teymu.
Manu ka hangan qbsuran su qrijil hug?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: Pitay ka hangan qbsuran mu qrijil.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Pitay.

S.FORM: Manu ka hangan swayi su qrijil hug?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: Ubing ka hangan swayi mu qrijil.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Ubing.

S.FORM: Klaun su ima ka hangan na hug?
Watan ka hangan na.
Piya hngkwasan ka qbsuran su snaw hug?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: Maxal rima ka hngkwasan na da.
Piya hngkwasan ka swayi su snaw hug?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: Rima ka hngkwasan na da.
Niqan sapah pyasan ka alang namu hug?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: Niqan.
Ga su meuyas patas sapah pyasan alang ka isu hug?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: Iq! Saw nami kingal tnsapah ka meuyas patas sapah pyasan.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: Ima ka snaw gaga hug?
Nirih tama mu ka hiya.
Ima ka qrijil gaga hug?
Qbsuran mu qrijil ka hiya.
Ima ka laqi gaga hug?
Swayi mu snaw ka hiya.
Gaga qmpah manu ka bubu su hug?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Empheytay ka hiya.
Gaga qmpah manu ka tama su hug?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Emptgsa ka hiya.
Swayi su snaw ka hiya hug?
Uxay! Dangi swayi mu snaw ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: Qbsuran su qrijil ka hiya hug?
Uxay! Swayi mu qrijil ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: Piya hiyi ka tnsapah dha hug?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: Niqan rima hiyi ka tnsapah dha.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: Piya laqi ka tnsapah namu?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: Kana o spac ka laqi nami.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: Piya ka swayi su hug?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Ungac ku swayi snaw, niqan tru ka swayi qrijil.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: Piya ka qbsuran su hug?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Ungac ku qbsuran.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: Piya ka mnswayi su hug?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Ungac ku mnswayi.
Mnswayi namu snaw ka yamu hug?
Iq! Qbsuran mu snaw ka hiya.
Tnpusu namu seejiq ka yamu hug?
Iq! Tnpusu nami seejiq ka yami.
Seejiq Balay uri ka hiya hug?
Iq! Seejiq Balay uri ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 是的，她也是賽德克族人。

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac jiyax sayang hug?
Mskuy hari ka karac, imah egu hari mtalux qsiya.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝點熱水。

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac jiyax sayang hug?
Mtalux hari ka karac, imah egu hari qsiya.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點熱，要多喝點水。
It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac nganguc hug?
Paru balay ka hidaw, iya suqi thidaw.
S.TRANSL: 太陽很大，不要曬太久太陽。
The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac nganguc hug?
Egu bi ka rulung, ungac qtaan karac ka hidaw.
S.TRANSL: 雲很多，天空看不到太陽。
There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac kusun?
Peungac hidaw ka kusun, egu bi ka rulung, paru bi ka bgihur.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac siida?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: Siida o pskuy hari, musa nganguc o plkusi wagi.
S.TRANSL: 那天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka karac jiyax sngayan?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: Malu karac ka jiyax sngayan.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: Pquyux ka jiyax siida hug?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Siida o musa malu karac, uxay pquyux.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: Pquyux ka jiyax siida hug?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Iq! Pquyux ka jiyax siida.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: Gaga qmuyux ka sayang hug?
Msuwal da! Smriyu ka hidaw da!
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: Gaga qmuyux hug?
Qmuyux da! Ini ku adas bubung!
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: Gaga qmuyux ka nganguc hug?
Ini quyux ka sayang, babaw nkan do pquyux da, musa nganguc o adas bubung.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶雨傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: Pskuy ka misan hkawas hug?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: Iq! Pskuy balay ka misan hkawas, plkusi egu lukus.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: Pktalux bi ka rbagan hngkawas nii hug?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: Iq! Pktalux balay ka rbagan, mahi egu hari qsiya.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Smkuxul su karac srnabaw hug?
Smkuxul ku karac srnabaw, yasa muxul balay ka karac.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，因為天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: Smkuxul su karac krpuhan hug?
Ini ku skuxul karac krpuhan, yasa egu bgihur paru ka karac krpuhan.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: Smhungi ku madas slhayan patas da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: Seupu ta qmita.
Smhungi ku madas ssrus da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: Kbrxun misu.
Smhungi su madas ppatas dhug?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: Iq! Kbrxi ku ppatas su hug?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: Mkan su manu ka ska hidaw hug?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: Mkan ku meynpaw.
Mkan su manu ka keeman hug?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: Mkan ku idaw.
Mnkan su nhapuy saman dhug?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: Mnkan ku balung da.
Mnkan su ska hidaw dhug?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: Mnkan ku hiyi rudux da.
Emta hmrapas boru qqahan.
Usa knama ka isu han, saun su miying kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: Emta tmapaq qsiya.
Ena wa! Emta!
Emta hmrapas boru.
Iya han! Emta thjil patas han.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: Snegus su gupun dhug?
Ini na! Gisu ku sminaw pratu.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: Sninaw su quwaq dhug?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: Sninaw ku quwaq da.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: Smninaw su pratu dhug?
Smninaw ku pratu mu da.
Ma su ini trima baga?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: Trima ku kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: Hmnuya su ka sayang?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: Mnusa ku miying emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: Phuya su malax pyasan kiya dhug?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: Asi ku usa sapah.
Phuya malax pyasan kiya ka hiya hug?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: Musa mgrig grig ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Away, Gaga su sapah hug?
Iq! Aguh mtmay nhari.
Away, Gaga su sapah hug?
Ungac sapah ka Away! Ipay ku ka yaku, hmuya hug? Rngagun mu miyah ka Away da.
S.TRANSL: Away不在家耶!我是Ipay，有什麼事嗎? 回來我會轉告Aawy。
Away is not at home. I am Ipay. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: Ima namu ka yamu?
Bubu rudan, Teymu ni Pihu nami wa! Jiyagi nami rmawah enduk!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Teymu 和 Pihu，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Teymu and Pihu, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: Ima hug?
Yaku o Watan, miyah ku miying Ukan.
S.TRANSL: I am Watan, I am here for Ukan.

S.FORM: Bubu rudan, nii ku miyah qmita sunan da.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq su ini iyah da, lnglungun misu balay.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Away, nii ku miyah miying sunan hmrapas da.
S.TRANSL: Away, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: Aguh mtmay nhari, bsiyaq ku tmaga sunan da.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: Hnuma mu ka bunga nii, uqi binaw!
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看!
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: Shiya bi uqan ka bunga nii.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: Aguh! Hnuma mu ka hiyi qhuni nii, uqi binaw!
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: Ssibus bi ka hiyi qhuni nii.
Tluung! Hnuma mu ka sqmu nii, uqi binaw!
S.TRANSL: 請坐!這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: Waw! Ssibus uqun ka sqmu nii.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: Mkan su mudu hug?
Naqih mu ka mkan mudu, mkan ku pingkwo do kiya da.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: Mkan su emu hug?
Iq! Kuxul mu bi mkan.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: Qmilis ku hiyi qhuni uqun su.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: Mhuway su! Egu bi biyuq niya ka hiyi qhuni nii.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: Mimah su qsiya hug?
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: Bqanun misu qsiya mahun su.
Mhuway su.
Uqi egu hari, egu ka hnanguc mu damac.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: Waw! Malu sknxan ni malu uqun uri.
S.TRANSL: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: Uqi egu hari, niqan egu na hini.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: Uxay ku qsiqa mkan dwah!
S.TRANSL: I’ll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: Uqi egu hari, niqan egu na hini.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: Egu da nkan mu, uxay ku mkan da.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: Jiyax sayang madas munan musa dgiyaq daya ka emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Egu bi preykaw ka dgiyaq daya msa ka bubu.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: Jiyax sayang madas munan musa qnpahan ka emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: Musa ta kmarig dxgal hug?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: Musa ta inu ka jiyax sayang hug?
Madas mnan musa siyaw yayung ka emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: Musa ta inu ka jiyax sayang hug?
Madas mnan musa dgiyaq daya ka emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Musa ta siyaw yayung ka jiyax sayang hug?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: Uxay! Madas mnan musa dgiyaq daya ka emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: Musa ta dgiyaq daya ka jiyax sayang hug?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: Uxay! Musa ta qpahan ka jiyax sayang.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: Emptgsa, Musa ta qmita manu siyaw yayung?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: Musa ta qmita ciyadan.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Emptgsa Musa ta qmita manu dgiyaq daya?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: Musa ta qmita klalay.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: Musa ta hmuya qnpahan?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: Musa ta qmita hnuma ta sqmu, niqan qtahi, walu qlahang hari.
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷。
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: Emptgsa, musa ta tmapaq qsiya yayung hug?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: Uxay! Musa ta qmita ciyadan.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Emptgsa, musa ta hmuma sama qnpahan hug?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: Musa ta kmarig dxgal.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: Niqan ciyadan ka gaga skkaya hiya.
Jiyax sayang qulung mu qtaan ka meudus na ciyadan.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: Niqan klalay ka skkaya hiya.
Yey! Wa! Smkuxul ku klalay, malu qtaan.
S.TRANSL: 耶!哇!我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: Niqan klalay ka skkaya hiya.
Uxay klalay ka gaga, Walu ka gaga.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: Qita hini binaw! Iya usa dhiyaq balay wa!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看！不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: Iq! Uxay nami musa dhiyaq.
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: Iya ttalang! Thuway mksa ptakur su da.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: Mkmqita ku nhari.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: Shuya su musa beygi hug?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: Pgriq ku rulu musa beygi.
Shuya musa sapah spuhan ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: Mksa musa sapah spuhan ka hiya.
Shuya su musa Pun-ghu hug?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Teapa ku sapah skaya musa Punghu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: Shuya su musa Pung-hu hug?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Teapa ku asu musa Punghu.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: Teapa su manu musa sapah?
Teapa ku ceyyun musa sapah.
Teapa manu musa sapah pyasan ka Lituk hug?
S.TRANSL: How does Lituk go to school?

S.FORM: Teapa rulu qrngul musa sapah pyasan ka Lituk.
S.TRANSL: Lituk goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Teapa manu musa pnrhulan ka Basaw hug?
S.TRANSL: How does Basaw go to church?

S.FORM: Teapa ddeynsya musa pnrhulan ka Basaw.
S.TRANSL: Basaw goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: Teapa su ceyyun musa sapah pyasan hug?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: Uxay! Teapa ku basu musa sapah pyasan.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: Teapa su ddeynsya musa sapah pyasan hug?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: Iq! Teapa ku ddeynsya musa sapah pyasan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: Teapa su kawtey musa Kaw-syung hug?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: Iq! Teapa ku kawtey musa Kawsyung.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: Musa su Tay-tung o teapa su rulu qrngul? Ya su teapa sapah skaya?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: Teapa ku sapah skaya, ida ini biyaw ka sapah skaya dha ka rulu qrngul.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: Musa su pnrhulan o teapa su basu? Ya su mgriq rulu?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: Pgriq ku rulu musa pnrhulan, ida blayiq kiya mgriq rulu dha ka teapa basu.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: Sdalih caw-s ka sapah namu hug?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: Uxay ka sdalih, ida ku teapa utubay musa caw-s.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: Sdalih yow-cyu ka sapah pyasan hug?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: Sdalih bi! Mksa do dhuq da.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: Sdalih tgaan rulu ka sapah uqan hug?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: Miyah nganguc sapah tgaan rulu mksa 5 spngan do kika dhuq da.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: Niqan su jiyax ka sayang hug?
Hmuya hug?
Mkmusa ku qmita sunan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: Niqan ddaun mu ka jiyax sayang. Babaw dhug?
S.TRANSL: 今天有事不在家。改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: Niqan su jiyax ka kusun hug? Musa ku miying sunan babaw nkan.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: Ena! Tgaun su sapah.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Tduwa ku hmruc hnang su hug? Shici mu hici.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄你的聲音嗎?我要做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: Ena! Malu wah!
Tduwa ruying hug?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: Iya! Naqih ku qtaan, ini kragi ka rpun uri.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: Ena! Psasing ku nanaq.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: Iya psasing uri.
Mhuway su! Sruwa su slingan.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: Ini huya! Psiling su manu?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: Mbbiyax su siida o qnpah su manu hug?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: Keysacu ku ka seuxal han, wada ku malax da.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: Manu ka gaga su qpahun sayang?
S.TRANSL: 那你現在在做什麼工作呢?
Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: Gaga ku qmpah sapah pyasan.
Ga mniq alang uri ka laqi su hug?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: Ini! Ga mniq alang breenux ka laqi mu.
S.TRANSL: 不!我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: Isu nanaq ka ga mniq sapah hug?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: Gisu ku tmabug kingal huling ni kingal qduda, ida tnsapah mu uri ka dhiya.
S.TRANSL: 我有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: Gisu ku Tmabug kingal ngiyaw uri, niqan tbugun lmhaw knan.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: Mkmsiling ku sunan quri Gaya tmsamac.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: Uxay egu ka klaun mu, ida mu syukun kana ka klaan mu.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: Qyqaya namu tmsamac o mgaya manu hug?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: Qyqaya nami tmsamac o ini ptlngi dqrijil.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女性碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: Ya tduwa tuhuy musa tmsamac ka qrijil gaga hug?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: Uxay kida! Ini tduwa tmsamac ka dqrijil.
S.TRANSL: No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Kuras, ungac da sinaw sapah, usa marig sinaw.
S.TRANSL: Kuras，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Kuras, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: Niqan kingal tasaw na hpuyan , iya barig han!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: Uxay baka ka kingal tasaw, usa marig dha tasaw dungan.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: Marig ku sinaw, niqan namu sinaw sbarig hug?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: Niqan wah! Marig su piya?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: Marig ku dha tasaw, marig ku kingal lubuy buwax uri.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: Nii ka buwax, marig su manu na hug?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: Marig ku balung na, niqan namu hug?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: Wada brigan kana da balung nami.
Marig ku lukus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Mkmarig su meenu na hug?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: Marig ku putuh usuk lukus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: Hmuya ka embanah nii?
Niqan ka ini ktna na rakaw?
Niqan nami embhgay ni mgkarac na.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: Biqi ku kingal lukus mgkanac na.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Kuras, mnusa su inu ka sayang balay hug? Mnusa su yun-tung hug?
S.TRANSL: Kuras你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Kuras, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Ini! Mnusa ku dmayaw marig damac bubu rudan.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: Kiya ? Niqan jiyax su keeman? Aguh seupu knan mkan nhapuy hug?
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊？你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯？
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Uxay! Musa ku marig lukus.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Tuhuy ku sunan musa.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: Embiyax su hug? Piya pila ka bnkiyan sama nii?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: kingal bnkiyan o empusal pila.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: Piya pila ka bunga nii?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: Kingal tay-cin o mtrul pila.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: Biqi ku dha bnkiyan sama ni kingal tay-cin bunga.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Basaw , wada ku smhungi madas ppatas da, tduwa su kbarux knan hug?
S.TRANSL: Basaw，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Basaw, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Ini ku adas uri, nPitay ka nii.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Pitay’s.

S.FORM: Kbrxun mu han hug? Uxay mu biyaw hadun?
S.TRANSL: 借我一下嗎?我很快就送還。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: Iq wa! Ngali.
Mhuway su! Jiyagi ku rmngaw mhuway su ksa ka Pitay uri ha.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Pitay for me.

S.FORM: Manu hug?
Miyah ku mhaduc dha patas nii.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: Ena! Manu na hug?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: Pkbarux ku tru patas nii na.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: Kiya da! Iya shngii ktru jiyax do haji duri.
S.TRANSL: 好了！記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: Ini su bqani knan ka knbrxan su ssrus na.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: Wada mu hadun shiga da.
Ma ungac qtaan ka ssrus mu da.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: Ya su wada kbrxun Basaw da.
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Basaw?

S.FORM: Ini ku kla. Saun mu smiling binaw.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: Kbrxi isu ka ssrus mu han.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Pitay, ya Basaw ka knbarux sunan wagi nii?
S.TRANSL: Pitay, did Basaw lend you this coat?

S.FORM: Uxay! Bnarig bubu mu sbgay na knan ka nii.
S.TRANSL: 不是！這是我媽媽買給我的
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: Mtna qtaan ka wagi Basaw nii.
S.TRANSL: Basaw ’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: Mqalux ka wagi niya, ini ktna ka rakaw nami.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Pitay, knbarux su pila Basaw hug?
S.TRANSL: Pitay, did you borrow money from Basaw?

S.FORM: Iq! Iyux mu bqanun jiyax sayang, wada ku smhungi madas pila da.
S.TRANSL: 有！我本來今天要還，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: Saw kiya do bqanun su knuwan da?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: Bqanun mu kusun da.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: Ena! Jiyagun misu rmngaw ka Basaw.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Basaw for you.

S.FORM: Mduuy dangar kika qmraq qowlic, mduuy durang kika qmraq tkurih, asi ka saw kiya.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: Han! Kla saw kiya, wada mu tgquan da! Kla saw kiya ini ku qraq.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: Tgsaun misu shuya smalu ka dangar ni durang dha nii.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作石壓陷阱和套頸式繩索陷阱這兩種。
Then I will teach you how to make two kinds of stone traps and neck rope traps.

S.FORM: Ena! Malu balay! Saw kiya do mpqraq ku samac da.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: Suqi bbaraw da spriq qpahan, usa mangal soki rpun emta qpahan.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: Ga psaan inu ka soki?
Gaga siyaw giya, usa mtmay ruwan rpun kika qtaun su da.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: Qlahang mangal, mhungun balay ka soki.
S.TRANSL: Handle with care, the sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: Iya qahi ka dangar mu!
Ga inu ka dangar su?
Ga lhbun pusu qhuni gaga.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: Ma su ini shngii na?
Snkrayan mu ka hini, klaun mu nanaq gaga inu ka dangar mu.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: Qowbu qsurux ka nii, psaun nami siyaw ayug qmraq qsurux.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: Mkla nami mduuy ngahi pngahi qsurux uri wah!
S.TRANSL: 我們還會用釣竿釣魚喔！
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: Ini ku duuy bhniq ngahi na tgsai ku babaw dhug?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: Ena! Supu ta musa pngahi babaw da.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: Tgsaun misu smalu qowbu qsurux babaw da.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: Ga lglug da bhniq ngahi su, ya bi tdaung da qsurux! bbili nhari.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: Iya han! Suqi lglug da asu. Blbil ku ngahi hini ka yaku, usa hiya ni jiyagi ku mangal kaji.
S.TRANSL: 等等！船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: Bbili knan hini ka qsurux, jiyagun misu bmbil.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊，我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: Malu balay wah! Egu balay ka nangal jiyax sayang, maku thngay kana ka rawa qsurux da.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: Emta nhari! Sai ta measug dhiya.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: Miyah da emptgsa!
Iya hmrapas da! Nahari tluung babaw tleengan.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了!快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: Akay! Msuqi ku da!
Nahari miyah ruwan.
Piya jiyax iyax sngayan ka sayang hug?
Rima jiyax iyax sngayan ka sayang, msangay ka kusun, seupu ta musa rmigaw nganguc haw!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: Malu hmi! Emta siyaw yayung.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: Piya jiyax iyax sngayan ka kusun hug?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Tru jiyax iyax sngayan ka kusun, musa ta hmrapas boru babaw ska hidaw ka kusun haw!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: Phuya su ka saman kusun hug?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: Jiyax sngayan ka kusun, tuhuy ku bubu musa pnrhulan.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: Ga su hmuya dhug?
Kmtbrih ku balay, musa ku psnganguc.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Mkuni balay tunux mu.
Msangay babaw tleengan ka isu han.
S.TRANSL: 你先躺臥在椅子上休息。

S.FORM: Emptgsa, mnarux buyas mu, musa ku psnganguc.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Iq wah! Nahari usa.
Tduwa ku musa trima baga hug?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: Uxay biyaw malax meuyas patas da, Usa kiya hari dwah!
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Emptgsa, mnarux tunux mu, msangay ku ka babaw ska hidaw.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Iq wah! Qlahang hari musa sapah.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Emptgsa msangay ku ka babaw kingal jiyax iyax sngayan, musa ku qmita empsapuh.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: Iq wah! Qlhangi nanaq ka hiyi su.
Gaga inu ka Ubing hug?
Mnarux buyas na, ga mniq psnganguc ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka Huwac hug?
Emptgsa, mnarux glu ka Huwac, kika msangay ka jiyax sayang.
S.TRANSL: 老師，Huwac喉嚨痛，所以今天請假。
Teacher, Huwac has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: Ma ini iyah ka Pitay hug?
Ga mnarux da!
Rngagi quri isu nanaq han!
Walis Huwac ka hangan mu, maxal hngkwasan ka yaku sayang.
S.TRANSL: My name is Walis Huwac, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: Ima ka hangan su hug?
Hangan mu o Ubing Pawan.
Meenu klgan seejiq ka isu hug?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: Laqi Amis ka yaku.
Klgan tnpusu seejiq ka kana tnsapah su hug?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Iq! Amis kana ka tnsapah mu.
S.TRANSL: 是的!我們全家都是阿美族人。
Yes, my whole family is Amis.

S.FORM: Klgan tnpusu seejiq kana ka tnsapah su hug?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Uxay, Amis ka tama mu, klmukan ka bubu mu.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是阿美族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Amis, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: Laqi su ima ka isu hug?
Laqi ku Pawan Nomin ka yaku.
Tama su ka gaga hug? Piya ka hngkwasan na da?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: ka hngkwasan na da!
Tama su ka gaga hug? Piya ka hngkwasan na da?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Uxay, rudan alang ta ka hiya, maspac kmxalan ka hngkwasan na da!
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了!
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: Piya hngkwasan ka qbsuran su snaw dhug?
Maxal maspac ka hngkwasan qbsuran snaw mu da.
Rabang paru hngkwasan isu ka qbsuran su snaw hug?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: Rabang paru rima hngkwasan ka qbsuran mu snaw.
Piya snkukuh kmbragan ka bbaraw hnigan su hug?
Kingal kbkuy spatul snkukuh kmbragan ka yaku.
Sndamac, ya wada mdakil hnigan su dhug?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: Kiya hmi, Kingal kbkuy mtrul snkukuh kmbragan mu da!
Uxay su wada qthur da?
Ungac, Qnuqu su qnita da!
Mliwang su dhug?
Ini, qthur ku da!
Qthur su dhug?
Iq, Mtrul hnjilan mu ka sayang da!
Musa su inu hug?
Musa ku sapah pyasan miying emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: Musa inu ka Walis hug?
Musa qmada sudu ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka Kuras hug?
Gaga tmapaq qsiya tpaqan ka hiya, musa pspung tmapaq qsiya kiya hari ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka Lituk hug? Musa pspung tmalang kiya hari ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: Lituk在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Lituk? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: Gaga pnrhulan ka hiya, musa ku lmawa hiya.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the churches. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: Seupu ta musa tlaman haw!
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: Musa ku marig uqun ska hidaw han, miying ku isu kiya hari da.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: Seupu ta musa mhakul hndayu haw!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: Usa miying isil seejiq, musa ku miying emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Musa pspung boru jiyax sayang ka Pawan hug?
S.TRANSL: Is Pawan competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: Ini, musa pspung sbowtaw ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: Musa su pspung ka jiyax Yun-tung-kay hug?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Iq hmi! Musa ku pspung tmalang.
Musa su pspung ka jiyax Yun-tung-kay hug?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Musa ku pspung boru.
Phuya ta ka jiyax Yun-tung-kay siida hug?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: Musa ta pspung brbil wasil.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: Brigun ta uuqun ka Yun-tung-kay hug?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: Uxay, brigun ta lukus.
Wada su nangal tgkingal biyax pspung su wah, uxay bi sleexan!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay.
Gaga mniq sapah ka bubu rudan hug?
Iq! Ga taqi tqiyan na hiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: Gaga mniq sapah ka bubu rudan hug?
Ungac, wada nganguc suni da, musa keeman miyah sapah ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: Gaga mniq sapah ka tama rudan hug?
Ga mniq qnpahan ka hiya, usa qnpahan miying hiya ka isu haw!
S.TRANSL: 他在田裡，你去田裡找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: Niqan seejiq sapah?
Ma isu Walis, bsiyaq ku ini qita isu da! Ya su embiyax na hug?
S.TRANSL: 是Walis阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Walis. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: Malu hmi! Miyah ku miying sunan pprngaw.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka tama su hug?
Ga mniq hpuyan cmiyus damac ka hiya , musa ku lmawa hiya ha.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: Ｗada inu ka Ubing da?
Wada qadu rowdux qmraq rowdux da!
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: Tama rudan, Miyah nami da!
Ungac sapah ka tama rudan namu, ga mniq qnpahan ka hiya, mniq sapah taga hiya ka yamu haw!
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: Miyah su da nirih tama.
Sndamac balay, mdakil hnigan su da!
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: Mqaras balay qmita sunan.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: Sbgay munan ka kalac nii, bsaan ruwan kulu huda ha.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq ini miyah da, lmawa ku kana mnswayi miyah mkan idaw.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: Ini huya , mimah ku ocya do malu da, emta strngan pprngaw.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay wah! Musa ku da!
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Hndu smipaq sayang balay ka rowdux nii, dsi sapah su thuway mkan.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: Smtrung ku sunan gbiyan kusun hug?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: Tduwa hmi! Smtrung ta inu?
Smtrung ta sapah pyasan hug? Ru-ing ta.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: Saw kiya do musa ta pslian , plukus ku lukus sbiyaw musa.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: Tnphpah kana ka phpah snegil alang ta o suyang balay qtaan, taga emphpah siida do o miyah miying sunan wah!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: Emptaga dhuq srnabaw na ， uxay suqi bsiyaq balay da!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: Saw kiya do smgasuc siida ka miyah su da haw!
Malu wah! Bsaun mu balay lnglungan.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: Hyaun ka musa su nniqan alang hug?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Musa ku tmgsa patas hiya.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: Ma uxay mniqan paru alang tmgsa patas?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: Yasa lnglungun mu balay ka alang mu, tay saw tduwa smbrinah alang mu nanaq.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: Mkla su bi tminun, ima ka tnegsa sunan?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: Bubu rudan mu, hiya balay mkla bi tminun mniq alang ta.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: Ma su kmsluhay balay tminun?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: Gaya ta ka tminun , mkpeiyux ku pllutuc ka gaya ta.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: Malu bi mahun ka sinaw balay nii.
Snalu mu nanaq wah!
Ma su mkla balay, bsiyaq smalu sinaw nii?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: Ini, saw hari kingal jiyax iyax sngayan do malu da.
S.TRANSL: No, it only takes about a week.

S.FORM: Niqan manu ka brigun su?
Niqan usik ni pixil ka yaku hini, hnuma yaku nanaq kana.
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: Piya pila ka marig dha?
Kana o dha kbkuy mrimal pila.
Kuxul mu bi ka lukus nii, piya pila hug?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: Rima kbkuy pila ka lukus nii.
Suqi mkray brigan da! Ini tduwa mhuway hari hug?
S.TRANSL: It's too expensive. Can't you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: Ini tduwa da, mhuway dungan do o ungac ka mskuri ku pila da.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I'll lose money.

S.FORM: Iq wah! Saw kiya do marig ku kingal mqalux lukus.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I'll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: Marig ku yayu ni kama nii.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: Kana o empusal kbkuy pila, snalu baga mu nanaq nii, musa bsiyaq balay dmuuy.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It's a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: Pgkla ku lupung mu miyah marig, tduwa musa mhuway hari na hug?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I'll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: Iq wah! Mhuway mu hari biqun isu.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I'll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: Iyah qmita cikuh wah! Ana saw lukus, bunuh niqan brigun kana.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: Piya pila ka lukus?
Kingal lukus o tru kbkuy mrimal pila, tru lukus o maxal kbkuy pila.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Marig ku kingal do malu da, bqani knan bgurah na.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I'll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: Embiyax su, mkmarig ku hlama dhquy ni mqri.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: Wada qduan marig kana ka idaw da. Niqan ku neygi na, marig su?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有蔥，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: Han! Biqi ku kingal, miyah ku babaw dungan marig idaw.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I'll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: Iq wah! Dmayaw ku sunan lbuan lubuy, kana o mrimal pila.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I'll pack it in a bag for you. That'll be 50 dollars.
